text: The Greek Wikipedia (also Hellenic Wikipedia, Elliniki Vikipedia, ) is the fifth language of the online encyclopedia Wikipedia. It started on December 1, 2002. By 15 December 2003, it had 1,000 articles. As of October 2009, it had reached over 45,000 articles.Statistics at Greek Wikipedia As of October 2015, it is the 50th largest edition of Wikipedia by number of articles. Piacere, Buongiorno sono il dottor Greco Roberto di via Toniolo 110/2 Modena, sono sicuro che per guidare una macchina, serve il foglio di Buona Salute Fisica e Mentale, poi la Patente, Elettronica. Poi serve, se sei partigiano il Bollo. L'assicurazione non serve piu', viene compresa nel prezzo del veicolo. == References == ==Other websites== * Greek Wikipedia * Greek Wikipedia mobile version * Statistics for Greek Wikipedia by Erik Zachte * Tell us about Greek Wikipedia * Pontic Wikipedia * Ancient Greek Wikipedia Category:Wikipedias Category:Websites established in 2002
title: Greek Wikipedia
